helloUsers: Hello {count, plural, =0 {no users} =1 {one user} other {# users}}
itemsInCart: You have {count, plural, =0 {no items} =1 {one item} other {# items}} in your cart
appointmentReminder: Your appointment is scheduled for {date} at {time}
weatherUpdate: The weather in {city} is currently {temperature} degrees with {condition}
saleAnnouncement: Big sale! Get {discount}% off on all items until {endDate}
eventInvitation: You are invited to {event} on {date} at {location}
meetingSchedule: Your meeting with {person} is scheduled for {date} at {time}
subscriptionExpiry: Your subscription will expire on {expiryDate}. Please renew to continue enjoying our services
orderConfirmation: Thank you for your order, {name}. Your order number is {orderNumber} and it will be delivered by {deliveryDate}
passwordReset: Hello {name}, click the link below to reset your password. This link will expire in {expiryTime} minutes
newMessageNotification: You have received a new message from {sender}. The message says: {messageContent}
systemAlert: System Alert: {alertType} detected at {time}. Please take immediate action
birthdayGreeting: Happy Birthday, {name}! You are now {age} years old. Enjoy your special day!
conferenceReminder: Reminder: Your conference '{conferenceName}' is on {date} at {location}. Don't forget to bring your ID badge
feedbackRequest: Dear {name}, we value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our survey about your recent experience with {product}
maintenanceNotice: Notice: Scheduled maintenance for {system} will occur on {date} from {startTime} to {endTime}. Please save your work
promotionAnnouncement: Congratulations {name}! You have been promoted to {newPosition} effective from {startDate}
serviceInterruption: Alert: Service interruption detected in {area}. Our team is working to resolve the issue. Estimated resolution time: {resolutionTime}
holidayGreeting: Season's Greetings, {name}! Wishing you a wonderful holiday season and a happy new year
projectDeadlineReminder: Reminder: The deadline for project '{projectName}' is on {deadlineDate}. Please ensure all tasks are completed
paymentConfirmation: Payment Confirmation: Thank you {name} for your payment of {amount}. Your transaction ID is {transactionId}
accountDeactivationWarning: Warning: Your account will be deactivated on {deactivationDate} due to inactivity. Please log in to keep your account active
webinarInvitation: You are invited to our webinar '{webinarTitle}' on {date} at {time}. Register now to secure your spot
shipmentTracking: Your shipment with tracking number {trackingNumber} is on its way. Expected delivery date: {deliveryDate}
passwordChangeConfirmation: Hello {name}, your password has been successfully changed. If you did not request this change, please contact support immediately
eventCancellation: We regret to inform you that the event '{eventName}' scheduled for {date} at {location} has been cancelled. We apologize for any inconvenience
loyaltyPointsUpdate: Hello {name}, you have earned {points} loyalty points. Your total points balance is now {totalPoints}
subscriptionRenewalReminder: Reminder: Your subscription for {service} will renew on {renewalDate}. Please ensure your payment information is up to date
securityAlert: Security Alert: Suspicious activity detected on your account at {time}. Please review your recent activity
appointmentCancellation: Your appointment with {person} on {date} at {time} has been cancelled. Please contact us to reschedule
newFeatureAnnouncement: Exciting News: We have launched a new feature '{featureName}'! Check it out now and let us know what you think
serviceUpgradeNotification: Good news! Your service plan has been upgraded to {newPlan}. Enjoy the new features and benefits
accountVerification: Hello {name}, please verify your email address by clicking the link below. This link will expire in {expiryTime} hours
